curl-http.description: The libcurl networking library for HTTP(S) communication.

curl-http-system.description: The libcurl networking library provided by the system for HTTP(S) communication.

curl-io.description: The libcurl networking library for websocket IO and handshakes.

curl-io-system.description: The system libcurl networking library for websocket IO and handshakes.

force-dll-import-export.description: Force interface symbols to be imported and exported regardless of the platform.

libcxx.description: An alternative C++ standard library, used by Unreal Engine.

libhttpclient-http.description: HTTP library that delegates to other implementations.

libhttpclient-ws.description: Websockets library that delegates to other implementations.

logs.description: Whether or not logs are enabled.

windows-use-msbuild.description: Whether or not to compile the SDK with MSBuild on Windows machines.

wslay.description: Websockets library decoupled from IO and handshakes.
